title: Where is Piers Morgan on Good Morning Britain today?
text:
Where’s Piers? (Picture: Rex Shutterstock)

Good Morning Britain viewers might well have noticed the absence of Piers Morgan as the show hit the airwaves on Monday.

The presenter hit the headlines last week after a Twitter poll over whether he should be sacked from the breakfast show backfired, with the majority of voters calling for his departure.

Now he seems to have disappeared – so just what’s happened to Piers?

Here’s what you need to know…

Where is Piers Morgan on Good Morning Britain today?

Despite the poll calling for him to be fired from the show, there’s no big mystery as to Piers’ absence from GMB – he’s simply having a couple of weeks off while the kids are on half-term.

He confirmed his absence last week as Wednesday’s progamme came to an end, saying: ‘Good Morning Britain is back tomorrow, I’m not. I’ll see you in a couple of weeks. Bye.’

The Twitter poll was launched by ITV last Monday to see whether fans wanted Piers to remain onscreen – with 60 per cent voting in favour of him being sacked over the next two days.

‘It’s now been hijacked by these snowflake websites and Twitter handles, so last night they were like, “We’ve got to get rid of him!”, they actually think they can get rid of me,’ Piers said on Good Morning Britain ahead of the final results.

‘We’ve now had over 300,000 votes, one of the biggest in the history of the show, and it’s now moved 59% against me, now viewers, you’re not the snowflake brigade, you are my people.’

Presenter Ben Shephard has been sitting in for Piers while he takes his GMB break.

Good Morning Britain airs weekdays on ITV from 6am.
